question: The Siwani copper plate grant belongs to the reign of which of the following kings?
explanation: According to Prof. J. Dubreuil, the Vakataka dynasty was the most glorious, the most important dynasty of the Deccan that have reigned from the third to the sixth century.Â The Siwani copper plate grant of Pravarasena II was discovered in 1836 in Madhya Pradesh.
